title: Mech Rush
summary: Mech-themed endless runner with customization, upgrades, and boss battles.
description:
Mech Rush is a mech-themed endless runner where players run through different worlds/levels, avoid obstacles, fight enemies, and face bosses to push further each run.

The game stands out with strong personalization: players can customize the mech's look (including body structure and color) and upgrade weapons/body parts, alongside power-ups for better performance.

This title has been removed from official stores; archived reviews and references remain available online.
responsibilities: Built/maintained configuration-friendly UI components to support content iteration (world/level progression, upgrades, power-ups).
Optimized performance and stability on mobile devices (loading, memory, runtime smoothness).
Worked with QA/design to validate edge cases, tune difficulty curves, and ship stable updates.
